ComicInfo.Summary: This issue features pants wetting humor from Max Cannon (Red Meat), Eric M Esquival, Gerrad McConnell, and Steven L Frank! Amazing artwork by Matt Hebb, Shawn Van Briesen, and Bill McKay! Shops that order this top-selling title are selling out!
ComicInfo.Title: Zombie-ing Camp; Picky Eater; Brain Dead Youth; Student Bodies
